programme.desc: Becoming Part 2 - Jim warms up to the idea of being the Trollhunter until he faces Bular, who is determined to destroy him, so he seeks help in Blinky and AAARRRGGHH!!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter The Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays With Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep1
programme.desc: Gran Day Out - When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep2
programme.desc: School Of Hard Rocks - When teamed up with her new friend Lerk, Eep's competitive side takes over when she sets out to win the first-ever school hunting exam at any cost.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep21
programme.desc: The Case Of The Knocked Down Fences - While Hoof is about to do his obstacle course, he finds all the fences knocked down. He blames Bling, who was jealous of the lucky wings he wears on his hoofs, but Bling assures she's got nothing to do with it ! Noddy investigates to settle their argument.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep22
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unfinished Building - Strange accidents keep happening on the building site. Clockwork Mouse is convinced that someone is trying to stop them finishing the building. Noddy investigates and finds out things aren't quite as they seem...

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep23
programme.desc: The Case Of The Damaged Magic Box - Pat-Pat is doing a magic show but she discovers her magic box is broken. Noddy investigates: Who broke the magic box? He needs to find out soon so that Pat Pat's show can take place.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep24
programme.desc: The Case Of The Lost Pirates - Armed with a brand new sat-nav from Fuse, the Pirates head off on The Pirate Challenge, sailing all around Toyland. But when they fail to arrive at their first stop in Toy Green, Noddy investigates what's happened. He must set the Pirates back on course to complete the challenge by the end of the day.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep21
programme.desc: Jungle Jiggles - Raa Raa wants a partner to dance a noisy stompy dance with. All the animals have their own way of dancing, apart from Zebby who says she is too shy to dance… or is she?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep22
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Great Big Noise - Raa Raa has decided that the jingly jangly jungle is not jingly or jangly enough. He and his friends make lots of noise, but soon learn that they need to work together to make a wonderful jingly jangly jungle noise.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep23
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Nap Time Story - Topsy is going to read Zebby a naptime story. Raa Raa wants to make the noises to go with the story. But they are all too loud and poor Zebby can't get to sleep. Can Raa Raa find any quiet sleepy noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep24
programme.desc: Go Bananas - Ooo Ooo is having a banana party. Raa Raa and the others have picked masses of lovely bananas, but how are they going to transport them back to Ooo Ooo's in time for the party?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep21
programme.desc: Mum'S The Word - Christine (Big Chris' mum) is visiting Silver hatch. As is Mamma Mia… serious competition ensues!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Best Friends Game - When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Shark / Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Pier - In hopes to have the whole beach to himself - Humdinger makes a robotic shark to scare everyone away. // The pier could fall into the water due to a broken support post.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice - Who's trying to steal Mr. Curry's prized Giant Pumpkin? PC Wells & Paddington are on the case. // There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Lost Keys - After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep519
programme.desc: George's New Dinosaur - When his favorite toy dinosaur loses its tail, George visits Mr Fox's Shop to find a new one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep520
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Train to the Rescue - Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep175
programme.desc: The Giant Strawberry - When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep176
programme.desc: The Quiet Game - After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Pups Save a Waiter-Bot - Mr. Porter's high tech waiter robot helps around the café, but it can't stop cleaning! It's up to the Pups to clean up the mess all over town!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The wig of power / The duck who parped wolf - Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel? // Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep207

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep114

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Stones of Power - When Santiago and his crew race to protect the magical Stones of Power from being taken by Bonnie Bones, they discover more than they bargained for. Luckily, they receive a little help from their hero -- Capitán Calavera!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark.

programme.desc: The Kingdom of Laughs-a-Lot! - Jesters Goby and Gil arrive in the Kingdom of NeverLaugh, where King Grumpfish declares that he'll outlaw laughter forever if no one can make him laugh before sundown! Will the Jesters be able to crack him up before it's too late?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Bubble Medics to the Rescue! - In Ancient Greece, Paramedics Zooli and Gil get a call for help from Nonny, so they fly toward him in their chariot ambulance! But on the way, they're pursued by a giant Cyclops! Will they help Nonny before the Cyclops catches up to them?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304

programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep177
programme.desc: The Funny Photo - While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep178
programme.desc: The Gift Box - The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep303
programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep802
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sweet Mayor / Pups Save a Magic Trick - Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin. // When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Pie-Clone - Mayor Humdinger creates a cyclone of delicious pies! The Pups must stop it before the town is covered.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Satellite flight / Diamond geezer - Everyone is grooving to Stu and Safia's dance song, so the Deer has to stop Steel's satellite from broadcasting hypnotic dance signals.// To impress Lady Fluffpot, Sir Steel tries to get his hands on Jade's precious Rainbow Diamond!

programme.desc: Skatey Cat / Weather Beaten - Nervous to jump back on her board after a bad wipeout, will Ronnie Anne ever skate again? feat. Lincoln Loud. // A powerful artifact is coming to the Great Lakes City museum and it brings along a storm for the Casagrandes!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Going Overboard / Walk Don't Run - Ronnie Anne begs Tio Carlos to teach her some moves when she finds out he is a famous skateboarder. // In order to buy a new skateboard, Ronnie Anne and Sid start a dog-walking business.

programme.desc: Running Mates / Dirty Duke - Mayor Fleck is running for re-election against R E Fendrich who will stop at nothing to win to use his power to defeat Sinclair once and for all. // When Duke loses his memory, Snake Rattler tricks him into believing he's Snake's criminal henchman.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Premium Parker / Toast of the Town - Parker makes some bougie new friends while the Middlemost Post is on vacation. // Angus and Parker compete in a toast-making contest hosted by Ms. Pam and The Middlemost Toast.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Sick Day - Alvin and Kevin pretend to be sick to miss school and sneak off to the Dagarack Convention.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep412
programme.desc: Crystal Ball Birthday - Annie and Amber offer to plan Brittany's birthday party, pitting her against Jeanette and Eleanor in the process.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep413
programme.desc: Artsy Smartsy - Theodore helps Simon to try and get past his perfectionism in order to complete an art assignment for art class.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep413
programme.desc: The Crush - Simon has a crush on the babysitter and secretly prepares a romantic dinner while Theodore keeps Alvin distracted.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep234
programme.desc: ChefBob - When Mr. Krabs puts in an open kitchen, SpongeBob gets stage fright and has to invent a new persona.

programme.desc: The Splinter / Slide Whistle Stooges - While working at the Krusty Krab, SpongeBob accidentally gets a splinter. // SpongeBob and Patrick are having fun with their new slide whistles, and, of course, it's driving Squidward crazy.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Age of Evolution Pt. 2 - With the birth of three new Terrans (hashtag, Nightshade, and Jawbreaker), the Malto family has grown. But will these new allies be enough to rescue Dot and Megatron from the clutches of Mandroid?

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Belles A Ringin' - While buying romance novels for a heartbroken Ellen, Nate discovers they are total cash cows. Under a pen name, he writes a best-selling graphic novel using the people in his life as inspiration until it catches up to him.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Fool's Paradise / Job Insecurity - With prankster Luan at camp for April Fool's Day, the Louds think they're safe. That is, until they break down in front of an unusual motel. // The kids discover Dad isn't at his IT job anymore and is now a dishwasher.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep225
programme.desc: The Crying Dame / Anti Social - To get Lily to stop crying the kids give her an old singing toy from the attic but it quickly drives them crazy. // Dad declares war on the kids' devices so they decide to show Dad how great electronics and the internet are.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep150
programme.desc: Krusty Dogs / The Wreck of the Mauna Loa - Mr. Krabs decides to start selling hot dogs instead of Krabby Patties. // SpongeBob and Patrick discover a lost ship.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep116
programme.desc: Squid's Visit / To SquarePants or Not to SquarePants - SpongeBob wants to have Squidward visit him at home, but Squidward won't come over, especially when he's perfectly comfortable in his own home // All of SpongeBob's square pants have shrunk in the dryer and the store is all out of square pants!

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Fear and Loathing in Yellow Springs - After getting stranded in the Yellow Springs desert, Parker and Lily's friendship is put to the test.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Closed for Cocooning - Parker wants to help Lily's sisters plan her "Wing Ding," but it's clear the little nimbus doesn't quite fit in.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep112

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Books That Made Us Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - As an actor, Claudia Karvan knows great storytelling is all about people, great characters. She wants to see what truths we can uncover about ourselves through the fictitious characters of Australian novels.

programme.title: Art Works Ep26
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Learn how Sydney Theatre Company created their latest work of "cine-theatre"; how sheds have been turned into unique music venues; about the art underpinning freestyle football; and about Indian classical dance Bharatanatyam.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Anh Do has been delving deep into his subjects' minds to capture their essence on canvas. Now he has a challenge with the much-admired surgeon Dr Charlie Teo, who has literally been inside thousands of brains.

programme.title: ABC News Ep3
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the latest news and the day's top stories, with reporters on the ground to tell you what's happening and why it matters.

programme.title: The World In 2022
programme.desc: From Port Moresby's beauty queens to Russian prisoners of war, The World host Beverley O'Connor presents some of the most memorable reports from the ABC's team of international correspondents in 2022.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep3
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the day's top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of what's happening as it unfolds.

programme.title: Dream Gardens Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - A young family turns their back on city life for a home with a garden spacious enough to accommodate all their needs. But can they balance a myriad of ideas to delight both parents and children?

programme.title: ABC National News Ep3
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. Plus reporters investigating the issues that matter. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Eat Smart Campaign Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - A visually impaired coconut farmer's inspirational story of beating the odds opens the season. Chef Julz cooks in Hula's pristine beaches dotted with mangroves, with the catch of the day and coconut as the hero.

programme.title: Tupaia's Endeavour
programme.desc: Tupaia, star-navigator, high-priest, artist, who ensured the success of James Cook's British Navy ship Endeavour's voyage to New Zealand in 1769. His pivotal role unrecognized until now.

programme.title: Books That Made Us Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - As an actor, Claudia Karvan knows great storytelling is all about people, great characters. She wants to see what truths we can uncover about ourselves through the fictitious characters of Australian novels.

programme.title: Art Works Ep26
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Learn how Sydney Theatre Company created their latest work of "cine-theatre"; how sheds have been turned into unique music venues; about the art underpinning freestyle football; and about Indian classical dance Bharatanatyam.

programme.title: Rural Flavours Ep4
programme.desc: Snack sized, kid friendly fruit and veggies are growing in popularity in Australia. The newest is the world's tiniest tomato - the 'tomberry'. But making life easier for consumers can be a lot of hard work for growers.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep3
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep32
programme.desc: In a rare in-depth interview, Federal Opposition Leader Peter Dutton speaks about some of the issues that shaped him and his vision for Australia. Colleagues who've known him for many years also offer their insights.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep3
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: The World In 2022 - Asia Pacific
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor looks at the big stories that shaped our region in 2022. From the Hunga Tonga eruption, to the assassination of Shinzo Abe, and China's push for power in the Pacific - the region has changed forever.

programme.desc: In this episode, leading experts help sort the facts from the myths about lightning, and show us new 3D techniques to trace the path of lightning strikes, which may improve lightning predictions.

programme.title: Dosukoi Sumo Salon #2
programme.desc: At DOSUKOI Sumo Salon we explore the sumo world with in-depth analysis and unique stats. This time, Hawaiian legend Musashigawa Oyakata joins us for a deep dive into first-time title winners.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: NHK Documentary
programme.desc: The hyper-convenience of our modern way of living produces staggering volumes of plastic waste each and every day. We investigate the emerging threats posed by plastic pollution to life on our planet.

programme.desc: We look at new trends in the iconic Japanese cuisine of sushi. One shop is putting a new twist on sushi ingredients, and another upscale establishment has begun to rethink its rigorous staff training.

programme.desc: Cardboard girl Danko, her friend Danta, and craft master Mr. Snips team up to make toys out of cardboard. In this episode, they make a super-realistic microwave!

programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
